description:
For more than four decades, The Rothenberg Law Firm LLP in Lakewood, New Jersey, has been a pillar in the community for personal injury representation. We are proud to have secured hundreds of millions of dollars for injured clients across the country. Nothing gives us more personal and professional satisfaction than guiding clients through some of the darkest times in their lives – and helping them secure the justice, answers and closure they deserve.

Why Choose Us?

Choosing a lawyer to act as your voice and advocate is a big decision. Our attorneys and staff take this responsibility seriously. From the moment you step through our door, we’ll work hard to earn your trust and loyalty.

Our goal is to provide not only unwavering legal advocacy, but also holistic support to address the many challenges you may face in the aftermath of an accident. You can benefit from our trusted network of health care providers, financial advisers, counselors and other professionals.

Ultimately, we want you to come away with the legal results you need to start piecing life back together. You can count on us to treat you like family. We’re passionate about going the extra mile to get the best results possible.  We call this “The Rothenberg Way.”

Learn More About How We Can Help

We invite you to schedule a free initial consultation by calling 800-697-9967. You won’t have to pay any attorney fees unless we win the case. The firm has multiple office locations in New Jersey, New York and Philadelphia.
